description: Online self-paced lessons via Möbius covering Algebra, Calculus, and MATLAB. Includes weekly tutorial problems and in-class activities. Best 6 out of 9 weekly submissions count towards final grade.

Two supervised computer lab tests (40 minutes each) assessing basic Algebra/Calculus skills. Test 1 requires manual solving, Test 2 includes MATLAB components. Unlimited practice attempts provided beforehand.

Typed mathematical solutions document focusing on written communication. Individualized questions requiring explanations of working and proper equation formatting. Submitted via Turnitin with emphasis on clarity.

2-hour comprehensive exam via Möbius testing advanced application of course concepts. Includes theoretical applications, problem combinations, and MATLAB components. Conducted in-person during official exam period.
